::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod thought about his battle with Deathscyth. He had suffered
considerable damage. He thanks to himself, that he will get revenge.
But he can't leve now, the full Predicon force could show up, and
moment.
"Run sensor sweeps of the area, we dont need more Pred's sneekin up on
us."
